  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationService

      public ApplicationService(ApplicationRepository applicationRepository, OpportunityRepository opportunityRepository, Validator validator)

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public Application apply(Student student, InternshipOpportunity opp)
      Allows a student to apply for an internship opportunity after validating eligibility and ensuring the opportunity is open.
      Parameters:
      student - the student submitting the application
      opp - the opportunity to apply for
      Returns:
      the newly created Application
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the opportunity is not open for applications

    • listStudentApplications

      public List<Application> listStudentApplications(Student student)
      Returns all applications submitted by the specified student.
      Parameters:
      student - the student whose applications should be retrieved
      Returns:
      list of applications belonging to the student

    • companyReview

      public void companyReview(CompanyRepresentative rep, Application app, boolean approve)
      Allows a company representative to review a student's application, marking it as successful or unsuccessful.
      Parameters:
      rep - the representative performing the review
      app - the application under review
      approve - true to approve (SUCCESSFUL), false to reject (UNSUCCESSFUL)

    • studentAccept

      public void studentAccept(Application app)
      Allows a student to accept a successful application, decrementing slots and updating the opportunity status if filled.
      Parameters:
      app - the successful application being accepted
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the application is not in SUCCESSFUL status

    • requestWithdrawal

      public WithdrawalRequest requestWithdrawal(Student student, Application app, String reason)
      Allows a student to request a withdrawal (before or after acceptance).
      Parameters:
      student - the student requesting withdrawal
      app - the application to withdraw from
      reason - free-form reason supplied by the student
      Returns:
      the created withdrawal request

    • processWithdrawal

      public void processWithdrawal(CareerCenterStaff staff, WithdrawalRequest req, boolean approve)
      Allows Career Center Staff to process a withdrawal request, optionally reopening a slot on approval.
      Parameters:
      staff - the staff member making the decision
      req - the withdrawal request being processed
      approve - true to approve; false to reject
